      • fillScoreCard

        public java.lang.Boolean fillScoreCard(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> upper,
                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> lower,
                                       java.lang.String scoreOption)
        Fills the current scorecard after each turn and returns a Boolean whether there are no more scoring options to pick
        Parameters:
        upper: - list of possible upper scores to have the user pick from
        lower: - list of possible lower scores to have the user pick from
        scoreOption: - score option chosen by user
        Returns:
        boolean telling whether there are no more scoring options to pick
